resources.string: Your recordings are stored on your device under the Internal Storage. Simply open the integrated File Manager app on your device, or download Astro File Manager. The file name is the current date and time of the recording.\n\nIn the next version, you will be able to view the recordings in this app and share them with others. Stay tuned!
To start a recording, simply press the button below. \nThe recording will continue until you press it again to stop. Press "help" to see information regarding storage of the recordings.
